name: Mother to Be Boxed Gift Set
description:
This beautiful boxed gift set includes a trio of indulgent pampering treats for new and expectant mums from premium British skincare brand Bloom and Blossom.

Contains a full size of each of the following:

INDULGENCE BATH OIL - a luxurious blend of essential oils developed to ease tension, melt away stress and encourage a sense of tranquillity.

The unique blend of active ingredients helps to prevent stretch marks and reduces the appearance of scarring, whilst also providing a wonderfully calming fragrance.


ANTIL STRETCH MARK CREAM - this is a rich and luxurious cream, which helps the skin maintain its elasticity and reduces the appearance of stretch marks.

Omega rich shea butter and cocoa butter help restore skin tone and provide a protective barrier to lock in skinâ€™s moisture. Almond oil soothes and nourishes with it's rich content of vitamins.  It also contains a 10% blend of the active ingredients horsetail leaf extract and chasteberry (the ingredients that actually do the work and give the results).


REVITALISING LEG AND FOOT SPRAY - specifically developed for pregnant women and new mothers as part of the Bloom and Blossom natural skincare range.  Created to alleviate water retention and to refresh tired and heavy legs, swollen ankles and feet.  The collagen boosting properties of aloe vera and tangerine leaf oil also improve skin tone.  It contains a 10% blend of the active ingredients horse chestnut seed and yellow sweet clover extracts (the ingredients that actually do the work and give the results).

Trio of premium skincare products by award winning brand Bloom and Blossom - Nappy Balm, Mother & Baby Oil and Indulgence Bath Oil.

This gift box set qualifies for free standard UK shipping.

If you would like us to send this direct to the recipient, you can let us know during the checkout process and include a gift message of your own choosing which will be included on one of our complimentary gift cards.

If you would like to create your own gift set, with your own choice of products from our lovely range, then visit our Bespoke Baby Gift Set section.

As always, don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions.

name: Magnetic Gift Boxes
description:
Our sturdy re-usable gift boxes add the perfect finishing touch to our bespoke new baby gift sets or indeed any other item you would like us to send on your behalf as a gift.

All items sent out in one of our gift boxes are beautifully wrapped in tissue with a personal handwritten message and then the whole box is wrapped with ribbon for a truly special gift presentation.

We offer three sizes of the flap over gift boxes which close with a magnetic seal.  In addition we also offer a small sized box with lift off lid.

We have given you some guidelines below in terms of the various box sizes and an idea of what type of items will fit in each box.  However if you are unsure and would like any help in selecting the correct size of box for the item or items you wish to send as a gift, don't hesitate to ask.  You can email us: hello@londonmummy.com or phone us on 020 8742 7815 and we'll run through your best options with you.

SMALL MAGNETIC BOX:

Approx: 210cm Length
             165cm Width
             85cm Depth

Suitable for a small collection of the smaller sized items such as bibs, burp cloths, soft baby shoes, Anne-Claire Petit small rabbit, rattles etc.

MEDIUM MAGNETIC BOX:

Approx: 295cm Length
             225cm Width
             115cm Depth

Suitable for a larger selection and number of items, such as larger sized Anne-Claire Petit toys i.e. fox, monkey, terrier etc, clothing, nursery storage bags etc.

LARGE MAGNETIC BOX:

Approx: 410cm Length

This very limited edition set comprises the reversable quilt and a pillow with it's own removable pillowcase.  These are very popular with toddlers and also make great sibling gifts when a new baby arrives.

A must-have guide to planning for and decorating beautiful yet practical rooms for babies and small children as they develop through the precious early years.

name: Mummy's having a Baby
description: A new addition to the family can be a worrying time for a first born child. This hardback book aims to explain and involve the child in this magical time, gently preparing them for the new arrival.

name: Gifts for Baby
description:
This hardback book contains 30 simple projects for newborns and babies up to the age of one.

You don't have to be an expert with a needle, many of the projects involve customizing bought items to turn them into unique personalized pieces. Others focus on painting and glueing rather than sewing - there is something for everyone, whatever their crafting ability. Each project is beautifully illustrated with step-by-step photography and accompanied by clear, easy-to-follow instructions, with all of the necessary techniques explained.

name: Children's Spaces
description:
Children's Spaces From Zero to Ten helps you to plan all the essential practical aspects of children's rooms and provides plenty of affordable ideas and inspiration when it comes to their design and decoration. This book looks at rooms for children between birth and ten years old, with chapters on babies' rooms, rooms for girls (how to cope with the pink flowery phase), rooms for boys (how to avoid the military look) and shared bedrooms, how to create a room that works for multiple occupants.

There are also chapters on sensible storage and areas that children and adults share - bathrooms, play areas, eating areas and outside space.

name: Anne Claire Petit Crochet Ball
description:
This tactile, organic cotton crochet ball, designed by Anne Claire Petit, is handmade and jingles when shaken or rolled - perfect for encouraging babies to crawl and nice and soft for when they reach the throwing stage!   

Machine washable at 30 degrees and suitable from birth.

Click image to enlarge.

name: Anne Claire Petit Crochet Rabbit
description:
Gorgeous 100% organic cotton crochet rabbit from Anne-Claire Petit, handmade and the perfect gift for a new baby or toddler.

Machine washable at 30 degrees and suitable from birth.

Height - approx 14 cm

name: Baby's First
description:
Record all those special moments in baby's magical first year, from the first night baby spends at home, to his or her first smile and first tottering steps. Once completed, Baby's First will be a wonderful and unique memento of the first year of your child's life.

As well as handy pockets for storing hospital bracelets, cards and other keepsakes, there is plenty of space for photographs, hand and footprints.

Irresistibly illustrated with adorable photography, Baby's First is the perfect gift for expectant and new parents everywhere.

name: Anne Claire Petit Elephant
description:
Gorgeous and wonderfully tactile 100% organic cotton crochet elephant soft toy by Anne Claire Petit - a handmade product. 

Machine washable at 30 degrees and suitable from birth.

Height approx 13 cm

name: 100drine Notebooks
description:
Love the quirky illustrations from French designer 100drine.  These square, spiral bound notebooks have blank pages just perfect for doodling and sketching all those great ideas whether at home or out and about.  

Each measures 13cm x 13cm

name: Easy Baby Knits
description:
Featuring beautiful baby knits that parents and babies alike will love.

With easy-to-follow patterns and imaginative projects this is the ideal beginner's knitting book. Step-by-step illustrations show you how to cast on and cast off, how to master the basic knit and purl stitches and how to get the right tension. Essential techniques, such as increasing and decreasing are clearly explained and there are also handy tips for fixing mistakes and reading patterns.

This hardback book contains a delightful selection of baby clothes to choose from plus some simple projects for the nursery such as the delightful bird mobile and knitted rabbit.

name: Anne Claire Petit Rattle - Pink
description:
Classic dumbell style, organic cotton crochet baby rattle from Dutch designer Anne Claire Petit.

Shake it and it makes lots of noise, perfect for interaction with a baby.

Suitable from 3 months.

Also available in blue.

name: Anne Claire Petit Flower Rattle
description:
Pretty, 100% cotton crochet flower rattle from Anne Claire Petit with a bell inside.

Exterior diameter approx 15 cm.

We also stock the classic Anne Claire Petit dumbell rattles.

name: 100drine Address Book
description:
Fab little spiral bound address book featuring quirky illustrations on the front and back by French designer 100drine.

Choose from either pink or yellow - both are gorgeous!

Click on thumbnails to view front and back image of each book.

name: Kids Birthday Cards
description:
Love these interactive kids cards by British company TC Design.

Blank inside for you to add your own personal message, the back of each card has a sweet little extra touch making them more than just a simple card.  

Worth keeping a little stash of cards to hand to save that last minute dash to the shops!

name: Magnetic Colours
description:
These magnetic home and travel play sets from Learnplay are such fun.

Use them on the fridge, magnetic whiteboard or any metallic surface, including the tin itself.

This set contains magnetic foam tiles in wipe clean vinyl with paint pot colour mixer and colour wheel spin dial.

Helps to teach the basic principles of colour and colour mixing and illustrates colour in both visual and written formats.

It also helps to understand the relationship between primary, secondary and intermediate colours. 

As this set contains small parts, it is not suitable for children under the age of 3 without adult supervision.

name: Floral Rose Nightwear
description:
These oh so pretty pyjamas by British company Powell Craft, are 100% cotton.

I love the little details on these; the pretty little flower buttons and cute ruffles to the trouser legs and pocket.  

Available in the following sizes:

Age 2-3 years
Age 4-5 years
Age 6-7 years
Age 8-9 years

name: Butterfly Nightdress
description:
Very pretty girl's cotton nightdress with short sleeves and featuring embroidered pink butterflies and lace trim detail. 

100% cotton
Machine Washable
